languages.text: "У этих людей словно прицелы вместо глаз. А мы с вами — будто парная мишень".
"I feel like these people have scopes instead of eyes. And you and I are a paired target."
languages.original_text: "У этих людей словно прицелы вместо глаз. А мы с вами — будто парная мишень".

traits.locale_text: "I feel like these people have scopes instead of eyes. And you and I are a paired target."
"I feel like these people have scopes instead of eyes. And you and I are a paired target."
"I feel like these people have scopes instead of eyes. And you and I are a paired target."
"I feel like these people have scopes instead of eyes. And you and I are a paired target."
"I feel like these people have scopes instead of eyes. And you and I are a paired target."

languages.text: "Es kommt mir vor, als hätten diese Leute Zielfernrohre statt Augen. Und wir beide sind das Ziel."
languages.original_text: "I feel like these people have scopes instead of eyes. And you and I are a paired target."

traits.locale_text: "Es kommt mir vor, als hätten diese Leute Zielfernrohre statt Augen. Und wir beide sind das Ziel."

languages.text: « J'ai l'impression que ces gens ont des lunettes de visée à la place des yeux et que nous sommes leur cible. »
languages.original_text: "I feel like these people have scopes instead of eyes. And you and I are a paired target."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai l'impression que ces gens ont des lunettes de visée à la place des yeux et que nous sommes leur cible. »

languages.text: 「ここの連中は、目の代わりにスコープでもついてるようです。そして私とあなたは、ペアで狙われてるターゲットです」
languages.original_text: "I feel like these people have scopes instead of eyes. And you and I are a paired target."

traits.locale_text: 「ここの連中は、目の代わりにスコープでもついてるようです。そして私とあなたは、ペアで狙われてるターゲットです」

languages.text: «Siento como si esta gente tuviera miras en vez de ojos, y usted y yo somos un blanco fácil».
languages.original_text: "I feel like these people have scopes instead of eyes. And you and I are a paired target."

traits.locale_text: «Siento como si esta gente tuviera miras en vez de ojos, y usted y yo somos un blanco fácil».

languages.text: “我感觉这些人的眼睛就像是瞄准镜，而我们就像是两个活靶子一样。”
languages.original_text: "I feel like these people have scopes instead of eyes. And you and I are a paired target."

traits.locale_text: “我感觉这些人的眼睛就像是瞄准镜，而我们就像是两个活靶子一样。”

languages.text: "Bu insanlarınki göz değil de dürbün resmen. Birlikte açık hedefiz."
languages.original_text: "I feel like these people have scopes instead of eyes. And you and I are a paired target."

traits.locale_text: "Bu insanlarınki göz değil de dürbün resmen. Birlikte açık hedefiz."
